data.meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force
data.sentence: The word الْغَالِبِينَ comes from the root غ ل ب and is associated with the meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word فَكَانُوا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
The word وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ comes from the root ن ص ر and is associated with the meanings: to assist/aid, succour, protect.
